about_the_game:
This year's special Christmas 2020 event starts with this beautiful illustration, named Forest Sprites. It's authored by our partnering artist, Betty Elgyn, and its cheerful spirit puts us immediately into a proper mood for the coming holidays.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Christmas Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. It's a relaxing puzzle with soft colors that will provide some challenge, particularly in the snowy areas around the sprites. We recommend the first playthrough to be with one of the lower tilesets before you move into a more advanced setup.
